summary: Craftable Dragon Priest Dagger and upgradable (see pics)
descriptionHtml:
This mod does excactly what the name says 

it makes the amazing dragon priest dagger fully usable and upgradable .

Also it is a ffected by the daedric tree and has a bit higher stats than daedric dagger .

Materials 1 Gold ingot and 1 leather strip for creation and 1 dragon scale for upgrade.

You can either download it with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager ) or downloading manually unzip it and

 place it at \Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data then when you or by downloading manually

 unzip it and place it at \Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data then when you open skyrim and go

 at data files and then you select Craftable Dragon Priest Dagger (if it is not already selected ) 

.Have fun with it hope you like and leave a comment or ask me questions :D
author: Garuger
